analysis.description:
ParyToken.withdrawalRequests (/unique_chucks/40/0xe9de21c5e7d74a7c27291acc7f8e7f126ab8d35c.sol#17-18) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- transfer (/unique_chucks/40/0xe9de21c5e7d74a7c27291acc7f8e7f126ab8d35c.sol#58-68)
	- transferFrom (/unique_chucks/40/0xe9de21c5e7d74a7c27291acc7f8e7f126ab8d35c.sol#93-111)

ParyToken (/unique_chucks/40/0xe9de21c5e7d74a7c27291acc7f8e7f126ab8d35c.sol#3-119) has incorrect ERC20 function interface(s):
	-transfer (/unique_chucks/40/0xe9de21c5e7d74a7c27291acc7f8e7f126ab8d35c.sol#58-68)

Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/40/0xe9de21c5e7d74a7c27291acc7f8e7f126ab8d35c.sol:
	Contract ParyToken has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/40/0xe9de21c5e7d74a7c27291acc7f8e7f126ab8d35c.sol#112-119)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
